directions: Beat coconut cream in a bowl with a whisk until creamy and smooth; add chocolate-hazelnut spread and stir until smooth. Pour the mixture into ice-pop molds.
Freeze mixture until solid, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®), or more to taste
title: Nutella®-Coconut Fudge Pops
